title: Asian Stocks Set to Climb on Year-End Rally Hopes: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equity markets were poised for a positive open, tracking Friday’s gains in US stocks that intensified bets for a strong finish to the year.
content: Asian equity markets were poised for a positive open, tracking Friday’s gains in US stocks that intensified bets for a strong finish to the year.
